title: Why should I hire dedicated .NET developers?
body: Hiring a dedicated .NET developer in your team can be beneficial in multiple ways including you can enjoy complete control over your team, upscale and downscale on-demand, and reliable professionals.

title: How much does it cost to hire a .NET developer through Uplers?
body: The cost of hiring a .NET through Uplers depends on your business needs. We charge 50% less than the typical market rates. We charge approximately $25 an hour, which is again dependent on multiple factors.

title: How experienced are the .NET developers at Uplers?
body: We at Uplers provide a range of .NET developers including Junior level, mid-level and senior-level. You can hire them as per your requirements.

title: Will the hired developer work in my business hours?
body: Yes, hire ASP.NET Developers from India who will work during your business hours. However, a 5% extra charge exists for the Australia and US region (4 hours overlap with IST timezone) and a 10% additional charge for Australia and US region (8 hours overlap with IST timezone).

title: How to hire a .NET developer from Uplers?
body: To hire a .NET Developer from Uplers, you have to follow a 4-step process starting from sharing the level of experience and expertise of the candidates you need, and we will shortlist the top candidates. You interview them and hire the desired one.
